query: Update the description of the explorer agent to mention it can also search for configuration files
expected_behavior: Agent auto-invokes agent-conventions skill when modifying an existing agent definition
Agent updates the description field in the agent's YAML frontmatter
Agent updates the corresponding README.md index table entry to match the new description
Agent keeps the index table sorted alphabetically by agent name
Agent runs 'wagents validate' after the frontmatter change to verify compliance
